item.title: No title
item.description: Rearchitected and redesigned Human Resources intranet . Performed all front-end design work, including content-driven CSS layout, jQuery UI…
item.content:encoded:
• Rearchitected and redesigned Human Resources intranet.
  • Performed all front-end design work, including content-driven CSS layout, jQuery UI (progressive enhancement), and ColdFusion templating.
  • Worked with back-end developers to create database- and ColdFusion-driven, JS-enhanced navigation system
  • Wrote style and training guides for content migration.
  • Helped design overall content migration plan and contributed to content migration process.

item.title: No title
item.description: Development of design system built using Pattern Lab (Webpack/Node) with Bootstrap, SASS, postCSS Front-end lead on Angular application for…
item.content:encoded:
• Development of design system built using Pattern Lab (Webpack/Node) with Bootstrap, SASS, postCSS
  • Front-end lead on Angular application for enrolling small businesses in insurance plans
  • Front-end lead on Sitecore- and REST-API-based prescription drug search application
  • Lead front-end dev on thick-client reports-management and –viewing application built with AngularJS and REST API built with Spring MVC and Spring Security with JWT Auth
  • Development of responsive sites with grid-based layouts, leveraging SASS-based CSS frameworks
  • FED for JavaScript- and REST-API-driven, responsive mobile customer web portal
  • FED on electronic billing application for individual insurance subscribers and benefits administrators

item.title: No title
item.description: Full redesign and rearchitecture of existing website on a custom content management system, built and hosted by Portland’s regional…
item.content:encoded:
• Full redesign and rearchitecture of existing website on a custom content management system, built and hosted by Portland’s regional government, Metro
  • Planned and coordinated redesign/templating, revised IA; usability assessments; customization of CMS and WYSIWG editor, UI elements (jQuery), and 3rd-party applications (calendar, image gallery)
  • Oversaw several interns and project volunteers

item.title: About me
item.description: This is the about page. About me. Things about me: Plays a front-end web developer Has 2 great kids and a mostly understanding wife Drums…
item.content:encoded:
This is the about page. About me.

Things about me:

  • Plays a front-end web developer
  • Has 2 great kids and a mostly understanding wife
  • Drums when he can, formerly in mostly loud bands
  • Knows a thing or two about chimpanzees
  • Can make enough schnecken to feed an entire breakfast shift, or some really crusty pain au levain (if given a few months)
  • Has replumbed, rewired, repointed, rewalled, and otherwise restored a few old houses
  • Loves getting into nature and spying wild creatures or mushrooms
  • Lives in sunny Portland, OR

item.title: Bio
item.description: Greetings, I’m Josh. A DC native, I live in Portland, Oregon, with my wife, 2 kids, and the only cat named Otter, from West Philadelphia…
item.content:encoded: Greetings, I’m Josh. A DC native, I live in Portland, Oregon, with my wife, 2 kids, and the only cat named Otter, from West Philadelphia, that I know of, in my neighborhood.

item.title: Talking Loud
item.description: Welcome to the future blog section of my site. It may languish in this state for ever a while. I’ll add a post when I can put together some…
item.content:encoded: Welcome to the future blog section of my site. It may languish in this state forever a while. I’ll add a post when I can put together some thoughts that seem worth committing to pixels.
